subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Also, Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer could meet in a quarterfinal match; in the women’s draw, Serena Williams could face Sloane Stephens in the fourth round.
snippet: Also, Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer could meet in a quarterfinal match; in the women’s draw, Serena Williams could face Sloane Stephens in the fourth round.
